sentences.sContent: For the most part, these same forces have been a boon, so far, to Americans who have a good education and exceptional creative talents or analytic skills.
sentences.sContent_eng: For the most part, these same forces have been a boon, so far, to Americans who have a good education and exceptional creative talents or analytic skills.
sentences.sCn: 而对于那些受到良好教育，具有特殊的创新能力或分析技能的人们来说，同样的情况在很大程度上是一种恩惠。

sentences.sContent: Once we have, through analytic meditation, come to an insight or deeper understanding, then we should cease our analysis and begin the practice of "calm abiding.
sentences.sContent_eng: Once we have, through analytic meditation, come to an insight or deeper understanding, then we should cease our analysis and begin the practice of "calm abiding.
sentences.sCn: 一旦我们通过分析冥想获得了洞察力和更深的理解，那么我们应该停止分析，转而开始练习“平静持久”。

words.tran: 分析的；解析的；善于分析的
分析者；精神分析医师；分解者
[计] 分析器；分析者；检偏镜

trans.tranCn: 分析的；解析的；善于分析的
